sentence.text: Defects in motile cilia and sperm flagella cause primary ciliary dyskinesia (motile cilium assembly), characterized by chronic airway disease, infertility, and left-right body axis disturbance.

This result has clinical and genetic counseling implications for genetically unsolved male case subjects with a classic motile cilium assembly phenotype that lack additional phenotypes such as intellectual disability or retinitis pignegative regulation of phosphatase activitytosa
